rpg.creature

Class Monster

  • java.lang.Object
    • rpg.creature.Creature
      • rpg.creature.Monster

  • public class Monster
extends Creature
    A monster is a special type of creature with additionally damage.
    Author:
    Mathias, Frederic

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Monster(String name, int maximumHitpoints, int damage, int protection, Item... items)
      Initializes a new monster with the given name, maximum hitpoints, protection and a variable amount of objects.

      • Monster

        @Raw
public Monster(String name,
           int maximumHitpoints,
           int damage,
           int protection,
           Item... items)
        Initializes a new monster with the given name, maximum hitpoints, protection and a variable amount of objects.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of this monster.
        maximumHitpoints - The maximum hitpoints of this monster.
        damage - The natural damage of this monster.
        protection - The protection factor of this monster.
        items - The items this monster carries.

      • getCapacity

        public Weight getCapacity()
        Returns the capacity of this monster.
        Specified by:
        getCapacity in class Creature
        Returns:
        The product of a weight of 9KG multiplied with the strength of this monster. | result == ( ( new Weight(9, WeightUnit.KG) ).multiply( getStrength() ) )
